attributes.title: Planet of Lana
attributes.subtitle: Wishfully Studio's newest game, Planet of Lana, is turning heads in the indie gaming community due to its stunning hand-painted visuals.

attributes.subtitle: Indie game Little Devil Inside from Neostream Interactive apparently will release in winter of 2022, a bit later than some fans were likely hoping.

attributes.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake
attributes.subtitle: Ubisoft finally provides an update on the Prince of Persia: Sands of Time Remake, but it is not something players were hoping for.
